thread.title: Adobe Creative Cloud price rise - anger as UK subscription deals soar
thread.title_full: Adobe Creative Cloud price rise - anger as UK subscription deals soar

title: Adobe Creative Cloud price rise - anger as UK subscription deals soar
text:
Adobe Creative Cloud price rise - anger as UK subscription deals soar Adobe Creative Cloud price rise - anger as UK subscription deals soar ADOBE Creative Cloud customers have been hit by a hike in costs today with some seeing their subscriptions almost double in price. PUBLISHED: 08:56, Thu, Feb 2, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:14, Thu, Feb 2, 2017 ADOBE Adobe Creative Cloud price rise 
Abobe Creative Cloud customers have been hit by a huge price rise this morning with some UK users about to see their subscriptions almost double in price. 
The US technology company, who's products include Photoshop and Indesign, have blamed the increase on "currency exchange rates". 
In the email, which was sent out this morning, Adobe says: "We wanted to share some important information about your renewal price. 
"As part of doing business globally, Adobe monitors currency exchange rates in order to make adjustments to our pricing up or down as needed. 
"You may be aware that currency exchange rates have fluctuated significantly over the last few years. 
"As a result of recent changes in exchange rates in your region, the price of Adobe products and services is increasing starting on 6 March 2017."
